title: Farfetch, Net-a-Porter and Matches do battle – but experts predict consolidation is on the way
text:
When Natalie Massenet joined online luxury retailer Farfetch in 2017, she placed herself in direct competition with the company she built from scratch 17 years earlier.

Massenet’s departure from Net-a-Porter followed what insiders say was a bitter power struggle after Cartier owner Richemont gobbled up the firm and subsequently orchestrated a merger with staunch rival, Yoox.

Federico Marchetti, who founded Yoox, was chosen as the most experienced candidate to run the newly-formed business, Yoox Net-a-Porter (YNAP). Massenet swiftly departed once the merger was completed. The 54-year-old now sits alongside technology entrepreneur José Neves as co-chairman of Farfetch, which he founded.

Her appointment,...
description: When Natalie Massenet joined online luxury retailer Farfetch in 2017, she placed herself in direct competition with the company she built from scratch 17 years earlier.
